General.Name: Ilooda Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Ilooda Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells medical devices for dermatology, ophthalmology, cosmetic surgery, and dentistry treatments. The company's products include Secret RF, FRAXIS DUO, Secret DUO, VIKINI, CuRAS, ULTRA BEAUJET, VeLux, hyzer me, VELOCE, PENTO, IRIS, RetiCapture, and FRAXIS lasers. Its products are used in face and body treatment applications, including hair removal, tattoo removal, hair bleaching, pigmented lesion, onychomycosis, melasma, skin rejunavation, face and necklines lifting, smile line treatment, stretch marks, hypertrophic and keloid scars, skin tightening, seborrheic keratosis, wrinkle and pore reduction, vascular lesions, toning and texture, resurfacing, whitening, diffuse redness, retinal diseases, acne scars, spider veins, vaginal tightening, urinary incontinence, lentigo, small mole, wart, blemishes, freckles, and hyperhidrosis. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Suwon, South Korea.
